item.title: New Amelia Earhart bio delves into her unconventional marriage

item.title: Get into the cockpit as new crop of “Top Gun” pilots get their wings
item.description: NatGeo’s new documentary series, Top Guns: The Next Generation, shows the sweat behind the spectacle.
